segments.text: What do you feel your greatest achievement has been at your current job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think my greatest accomplishment has been acquiring the Hans account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That certainly is quite an accomplishment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it took a year and a lot of initiative to get that account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's your sales record been like there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The last two years we have seen an increase in sales of about 30 % to 40 % each year , so I â€™ m very pleased . And our sales projections are quite good for the next two years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If things are going so well , why do you want to leave the firm now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm ... I think I am ready for a new challenge . I've put a good team together at my present company , and I think If I want to take the next step in my career , it's time for me to move on .
segments.speaker: S2
